entry.title: Tahoe Sunspots Floral Tooled Cross Inlaid Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Headstalls
Price: 39.95

You'll definitely want to add this stylish and durable headstall to your riding gear. Features a hand tooled floral pattern, cross cow hair inlays, and sterling silver hardware and sunspots. A great addition to your tack room!

  • Cross cow hair inlay
  • Hand tooled floral design
  • Stainless steel hardware and sunspots

entry.title: Tahoe Basket Tooled Triple Cross Inlaid Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Headstalls
Price: 39.95

This headstall features basket weave designed leather and inlaid crosses with cow hair. The leather is made with a wide browband and cheek pieces. The London tan leather pairs perfectly with the dark crosses of cow hair. This bridle will look great on any horse

This set is sure to be a hit in the show ring, or at contests, rodeos, parades, or even just on the trail. This set is sized for the average horse (900-1300lbs).

entry.title: Tahoe Tack USA Leather Kickin’ Country Gold Star Concho Western Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 34.95

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western headstalls for over 20 years. Their headstalls feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern of breast collar, designed to suit all riders. This headstall does NOT include reins. 


  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this headstall was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • USA LEATHER - this headstall is made with high-grade American leather from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania, and is extraordinarily supple, soft, and long-lasting.
  • GOLD STAR CONCHO DESIGN - this headstall features a unique concho design of a western gold star in a silver circle.
  • HORSE SIZE AVAILABLE - this headstall is available in Full Horse sizing to accommodate most average sized equines.
  • STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this headstall features high-quality stainless steel hardware that will not rust or tarnish, and remain beautiful for years to come.

Detailed Product Information

Collection: Kickin’ Country

Material: Double-Layered Leather

Leather Color: Natural

Leather Type: American Leather

Type: Headstall

Tooling Type: N/A

Hardware Type: Stainless Steel

Rustproof Hardware: Yes

Inlay: No

Spotting: Yes

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Soft White Show Studded Hair-On Cowhide Western Browband Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 40.95

Tahoe Tack’s “Jewel of the West” collection was designed to dazzle in the show ring and is composed of only the most beautiful headstalls which are adorned with hand-tooled accents, conchos, show spots, crystals, and many other elegant features. These headstalls exemplify the beauty of fine western tack and are meant to highlight your horse’s features and allow you to stand out in the show ring.

 

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this headstall was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • HORSE SIZE AVAILABLE - this headstall is available in Full Horse sizing to accommodate most average sized equines.
  • HAIR-ON COWHIDE ACCENTS - the browband and cheekpieces of this headstall are made of a natural, soft-white colored hair-on cowhide leather, which adds contrast to the dark oil leather that composes the other parts of the headstall.
  • SPOTTING AND CONCHOS - this headstall is adorned with antique gold colored conchos on the browband and cheek, which are surrounded on either side by a row of silver spots.
  • CHICAGO SCREW STYLE - this headstall features classic Chicago screw style ends, which makes adding or switching bits out as easy as can be.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this headstall was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.

MULTIPLE SIZES AVAILABLE - this headstall is available in Miniature Horse, Pony, and Full Horse sizing to accommodate most equines large or small.

DOUBLE STITCHING - this headstall features attractive white double stitching which provides extra security and durability, while also providing an attractive contrast to the dark leather.

CHICAGO SCREW STYLE - this headstall features classic Chicago screw style ends, which makes adding or switching bits out as easy as can be.

Miniature Horse (150-300lbs)

  • Bit to Bit: 27” - 33”

  • Browband: 14.5”
  • Bit to Bit: 29.5” - 35.5”
